resources.string: stuff to put other stuff in

cardboard box, corrugated fiberboard box, folding carton box, wooden box, plastic container, clamshell, foam food container, lunch box/Tuppelware, food carrier, basket, waste basket, bin, crate, case, trunk, chest

tops (t-shirt, shirt, long-sleeve shirt, blouse, cardigan, sweater, jumper, hoodie), trousers (jeans, denim, dungaree, sweat pants, shorts), skirt, romper suit/onesie, dress (gown, wrap dress, sari, sarong, kaftan, tunic, toga)
